rawText:
Mobile :  8489235259 
E-Mail  : pushparanis0905@gmail.com 
Github : github.com/Pushparani S 
LinkedIn :  linkedin.com/in/pushparani-s-1437b1243 
Pushparani S 
Web Developer 
 
SUMMARY 
 
 
A motivated individual with in-depth knowledge of languages and development tools, seeking a position in a growth-oriented company 
where I can use my skills to the advantage of the company while having the scope to develop my own skills. 
 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
 
◆ HTML5 ◆ Laravel 
◆ CSS3 ◆ CodeIgniter 
◆ JavaScript ◆ MySQL 
◆ JQuery JS ◆ REST APIs 
◆ PHP ◆ Moodle LMS 
 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
 
COMPANY: X-MEDIA SOLUTIONS 
ROLE: WEB DEVELOPER 
EXPERIENCE : 1 YEAR (September 2022 - PRESENT) 
PROJECTS: 
◆ L&T Workmen Mobilization (web & mobile) - Internal Communication and Worker hiring management App 
 
◆ CDMS Online University (web) - E-Learning Platform 
◆ Avtarlabs (web) - E-learning Platform 
◆ VRBIZTEC (web) - Engineering Drawings - Viewing Application 
◆ Canli (website) - E-commerce Website 
 
ROLES & RESPONSIBILITIES : 
 
◆ Design and implement database schemas for web applications. This includes creating tables, columns, and relationships, and ensuring 
that the schema meets the needs of the application. 
◆ Integrate payment processing into web applications. This includes working with payment processors, configuring the integration, and 
testing the integration. 
◆ Design and develop REST APIs that meet the needs of clients and users. This includes defining the API's endpoints, parameters, and 
responses. 
◆ Integrate third-party APIs into web applications. This includes understanding the third-party API's Conducted Functional, Regression, 
Integration and System testing to identify the software defects. 
 
EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATIONS 
 
BACHELOR DEGREE : B.Sc(Mathematics) - Manonmaniam Sundarnar University(2017-2020). 
MASTER DEGREE : M.Sc(Mathematics) - Manonmaniam Sundarnar University (2020-2022). 
 
COURSES 
 
Java (Core Java) : Fita Academy, Chennai.
